00002  * CFlag.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 30.07.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "CFlag.h"
00009 
00010 namespace galaxy {
00011 
00012 const Uint16 FLYING_BASEFRAME = 174;
00013 const Uint16 WAVING_BASEFRAME = 181;
00014 
00015 const Uint16 ANIMATION_TIME = 8;
00016 const Uint16 SPEED = 64;
00017 
00018 CFlag::CFlag(CMap *pmap, const VectorD2<Uint32> &Location,
00019    const VectorD2<Uint32> &Destination) :
00020 CObject(pmap, Location.x, Location.y, OBJ_NONE),
00021 m_location(Location),
00022 m_destination(Destination),
00023 m_baseframe(FLYING_BASEFRAME),
00024 processState(&CFlag::processFlying)
00025 {
00026  solid = false;
00027  honorPriority = false;
00028 
00029  // Here we move the coordinates in order get it positioned correctly in the pole
00030  m_destination.x += (6<<STC);
00031  CSprite &Sprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(WAVING_BASEFRAME);
00032  m_destination.y -= Sprite.m_bboxY2;
00033  m_destination.y += (1<<STC);
00034 }
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * Main process cycle
00038  */
00039 void CFlag::process()
00040 {
00041  (this->*processState)();
00042 }
00043 
00044 /**
00045  * Called when Flag is flying to the pole
00046  */
00047 void CFlag::processFlying()
00048 {
00049  if(mp_Map->getAnimtiletimer()%ANIMATION_TIME == 0)
00050  {
00051   if(sprite-m_baseframe >= 4)
00052    sprite = m_baseframe;
00053   else
00054    sprite++;
00055  }
00056 
00057  if(m_destination != m_location)
00058  {
00059   VectorD2<int> dir = m_destination - m_location;
00060   float length = dir.GetLength();
00061   VectorD2<float> base_dir( dir.x/length, dir.y/length );
00062 
00063   if( fabs(length) < SPEED )
00064   {
00065    moveTo(m_destination);
00066   }
00067   else
00068    moveDir(base_dir*SPEED);
00069 
00070   m_location.x = getXPosition();
00071   m_location.y = getYPosition();
00072  }
00073  else
00074  {
00075   processState = &CFlag::processWaving;
00076   m_baseframe = WAVING_BASEFRAME;
00077  }
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*
00081  * Called when flag is in the pole
00082  */
00083 void CFlag::processWaving()
00084 {
00085  if(mp_Map->getAnimtiletimer()%ANIMATION_TIME == 0)
00086  {
00087   if(sprite-m_baseframe >= 3)
00088    sprite = m_baseframe;
00089   else
00090    sprite++;
00091  }
00092 }
00093 
00094 }
